properties.value:
{
    "Device Unreachable WF":
        {
            "flow_version": "1.0.0",
            "flow_name": "Device Unreachable",
            "description": "Flow for Device Unreachable",
            "variables": {
                "count_chronic_events": {
                    "display_name": "count_chronic_events",
                    "type": "int",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "min_length": "0",
                    "max_length": "25",
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Maximum number of Incident for chronic check"
                },
                "chronics_time": {
                    "display_name": "chronics_time",
                    "type": "int",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "min_length": "0",
                    "max_length": "25",
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Past time duration for chronic check"
                },
                "chronics_time_unit": {
                    "display_name": "chronics_time_unit",
                    "type": "string",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "choices": ["days", "hours", "minutes", "seconds"],
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Chronic time unit"
                },
                "closed_review_timer": {
                    "display_name": "closed_review_timer",
                    "type": "string",
                    "input_type": "text",
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Closed review timer"
                },
                "p1_p2_max_check_counter": {
                    "display_name": "p1_p2_max_check_counter",
                    "type": "int",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "min_length": "0",
                    "max_length": "10",
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Number of times loop occurs"
                },
                "max_check_counter": {
                    "display_name": "max_check_counter",
                    "type": "int",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "min_length": "0",
                    "max_length": "10",
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Number of times loop occurs"
                },
                "hold_timer_fail_test": {
                    "display_name": "hold_timer_fail_test",
                    "type": "int",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "min_length": "0",
                    "max_length": "60",
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Fail test hold timer value"
                },
                "hold_timer_fail_test_unit": {
                    "display_name": "hold_timer_fail_test_unit",
                    "type": "string",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "choices": ["days", "hours", "minutes", "seconds"],
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Fail test hold timer unit"
                },
                "hold_timer_pass_test": {
                    "display_name": "hold_timer_pass_test",
                    "type": "int",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "min_length": "0",
                    "max_length": "60",
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Pass test hold timer value"
                },
                "hold_timer_pass_test_unit": {
                    "display_name": "hold_timer_pass_test_unit",
                    "type": "string",
                    "input_type": "dropdown",
                    "choices": ["days", "hours", "minutes", "seconds"],
                    "required": "true",
                    "help_text": "Pass test hold timer unit"
                },
                "low_pri_device_category_list": {
                    "display_name": "low_pri_device_category_list",
                    "type": "string",
                    "input_type": "text",
                    "choices": ["video.*"],
                    "help_text": "Low priority device category list e.g Please enter comma, separated inputs"
                }
            }
        },

properties.name: Mapping Details

actions.name: HTTP Request
actions.title: Token Request on AMP Visibility Target

properties.display_name: Token Request on AMP Visibility Target

properties.description: This API needs to be done in order to extract the required WFs IDs.

properties.script:
import json
true, false = True, False
WF_ID_mapping = {}

WF_list = ['BGP Neighbor Down WF', 'Call Recording Failure', 'CPU Threshold WF', 'CPU Utilization WF', 'Device Unreachable WF', 'EIGRP Neighbor Down HSBC WF', 'EIGRP Neighbor Down WF', 'Interface Bandwidth WF', 'Interface Down HSBC WF', 'Interface Down WF', 'Interface Errors WF', 'Memory Threshold WF', 'UC Service Down WF', 'Web Services Health Check WF']

response = $activity.definition_activity_01UV4C8QLBXI72NaQhhUIqIEzGgDXbqVV2q.output.response_body$

print(f'Total length of list {len(WF_list)}')


for i in response:
    if i.get('name') in WF_list:
        WF_ID_mapping[i.get('name')] = i.get('id')

WF_ID_mapping = json.dumps(WF_ID_mapping)
Mapping_length = len(WF_list)
print(WF_ID_mapping)

blocks.name: Condition Branch
blocks.title: While looping counter is less than equal to Mapping length

properties.display_name: While looping counter is less than equal to Mapping length

properties.script:
WF_ID_mapping = $activity.definition_activity_01UVY6XHM79GE5MxmxV4KKIjNanSxIngfso.output.script_queries.WF_ID_mapping$

WF_list = list(WF_ID_mapping.keys())
WF_name, WF_ID = '',''
try:
  WF_name = WF_list[$workflow.definition_workflow_01UTEZXXYFH4J4LDJd2hdgcH9O9HTlg6Idq.local.variable_workflow_01UVYPUUWT8IP2SsJlN24XbIqn6vQ9xWzrD$]
  WF_ID = WF_ID_mapping[WF_name]
except:
  pass
print(WF_name, WF_ID)
